nationality.content:

| Person | Nationality | Whether the Person has the Nationality |
|---|---|---|
| Shilpa Shetty | Indian | Yes |
| British contestants | British | Yes |

2. The specific location is "India", which is the home country of the Bollywood movie star, Shilpa Shetty.

Hierarchical Relationship Table:

| Broader Location | Specific Location | Whether the Broader Location contains the Specific Location |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Britain (or the UK) | India | Yes, Britain (or the UK) contains India geographically and politically. |
